Package AdvancedShape

Interface AdvancedShape

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.awt.Shape
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdvancedEllipse, AdvancedLine, AdvancedPlot, AdvancedPolygon, AdvancedRectangle
    public interface AdvancedShape
extends java.awt.Shape

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        java.lang.String toString​(int screenWidth,
                          int screenHeight)
        returns the string type of the shape and size
        Parameters:
        screenWidth - width of the GUI window
        screenHeight - height of the GUI window
        Returns:
        string in VEC format eg: (RECTANGLE 0.1 0.2 0.3 0.4)

      • render

        Draws the Plot with color to a Graphics2D object

      • updateSize

        void updateSize​(int x,
                int y)
        Updates the size of the AdvancedShape to new width and height
        Parameters:
        x - new width in pixels
        y - new height in pixels

      • isTransparent

        boolean isTransparent()
        Returns:
        return true if object is transparent, false if not

      • setTransparent

        void setTransparent​(boolean transparent)
        Parameters:
        transparent - set object transparency true/false

      • updateScale

        void updateScale​(double screenWidthDiffPercent,
                 double screenHeightDiffPercent)
        updates the scale of the AdvancedShape when the GUI window is being dragged
        Parameters:
        screenWidthDiffPercent - difference in screen width after resizing the GUI window
        screenHeightDiffPercent - difference in screen height after resizing the GUI window
